name: __EControlRigComponentSpace
doc: Enum for controlling which space a transform is applied in.

ActorSpace: The space below the actor's root transform
ComponentSpace: The space defined by the Control Rig Component
RigSpace:
The space within the rig. Currently the same as Component Space.
Inside of control rig this is called 'Global Space'.
LocalSpace: The space defined by each element's parent (bone, control etc)
